Articles.Content:
Hello, here I present you, after a full week of testing the spacecraft, the marvelous Kraken V2!

Information

This rocket allows you to go anywhere. Literally anywhere.

It is able to go from Kerbin to Minmus, back to Kerbin and then back to Minmus and if you're lucky, you might make it back to Kerbin too.

It has been designed with keeping in mind that in future updates there will be more planets, this rocket has been prepared for those updates.

The Kraken is hard to control, mostly due to huge amount of power allowing you to get into orbit rapidly.

At takeoff, the inner stage, outer stage and SRBs are used.

Firstly, the SRBs disconnect.

Secondly, the inner stage disconnects.

Thirdly, the outer stage disconnects (you would be burning to the Mun right now).

Fourthly, the orbital rendezvous stage disconnects.

Fifthly, the two landing engines including the landing legs disconnects.

Sixth, the parachute opens.

I can't remember which mods I used to create the craft but I think it's KW Rocketry.

Images:

A minute after takeoff.

Beauty shot of the engines.

Landing stage.

Download link

http://www.speedyshare.com/6RMtN/Kraken-V2.craft
